txt.en: You have put an end to Gothmog's plans to enslave the nameless creatures that dwell beneath Ephel Dúath. Without their unusual might to bolster Gothmog's forces, it is likely Minas Morgul will not long withstand the armies of Gondor.
Hoping to wield their ancient power, cultists of Minas Morgul have drawn nameless creatures into the Wracking-hall.
You have defeated many of the nameless creatures in the Wracking-hall.
Defeat nameless creatures in the Wracking-hall ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The Wracking-hall can be found in the Circle of Death.\n\nYou have encountered nameless creatures in the Wracking-hall of Minas Morgul. You should defeat them.
Defeated nameless creatures in the Wracking-hall ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

After failing to turn the tide of the Battle of the Pelennor Fields, the cultists of Minas Morgul have sought to master the power of the nameless things that dwell beneath Ephel Dúath.

These terrible creatures have overrun the Wracking-hall where Gothmog's cultists seek to gain their servitude through greater and greater offerings of Orcs and Uruk-hai.

You must put a stop to these creatures if Minas Morgul is ever to be reclaimed for Gondor.
